description.narrative: The overall objective of project is to explore the needs for and expand support to strengthening national system for monitoring of SDG national indicators

participating-org.narrative: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

provider-org.narrative: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1.1 # of interdepartmental technical working groups established to improve statistical accounting on SDGs. 1.2. # of developed strategies for preparation of indicators/metadata for monitoring SDGs including draft national framework on SDG indicators. 1.3. # of conducted seminars to finalize the draft SDG monitoring strategy. 1.4. # of organized seminars on SDG data exchange format and specifications of the national reporting format. 1.5. # of interdepartmental agreements on the metadata exchange . 1.6. # of data and metadata exchange pilots. 1.7. # of reports including the final version of data/metadata exchange format, action plan for implementation of interdepartmental data/metadata exchange format. 1.8. # improved technical capacity of the interdepartmental technical working group on SDGs. 1.9. # of specifications developed, validated and presented for consideration to the Government of the RT and potential donors for financing. 2.1. # of draft technical specifications prepared and endorsed for the national dissemination platform. 2.2. # of reporting platforms for monitoring progress developed. 2.3. # of national reporting platforms online and publicly accessible. 2.4. # of capacity building events organized to improve the statistical literacy of users. 3.1. # of surveys conducted to access users needs on SDG monitoring. 3.2. # of developed user engagement strategies. 3.3. # of conducted roundtables with users. 3.4. # of trainings on statistical literacy. 3.5. # of trainings with SDG stakeholder. 3.6. # of Ads/Outreach materials developed and launched on National TV. 3.7. # of National seminars conducted on progress towards SDGs achievement 4.1. # prepared draft of "Statistical Classifications for SDG Indicators" publication. 4.2. # of trainings for NSS representatives on production of SDG data/metadata 4.3. # prepared draft of the SDG Metadata Handbook. 4.4. # updated SDG Metadata Handbook 4.5. # Compendium published and printed in 3 languages
